tool.name: Chado biomaterials delete
tool.command:
@START_PSQL@ &&
chakin expression delete_biomaterials
#if $names: --names '$names' #end if #if $ids: --ids '$ids' #end if #if $organism_id: --organism_id '$organism_id' #end if #if $analysis_id: --analysis_id '$analysis_id' #end if > '$results'
&& @ZIP_PSQL@

param.name: names
param.label: Names
param.help: JSON list of biomaterial names to delete.

param.name: ids
param.label: Ids
param.help: JSON list of biomaterial ids to delete.

tool.help:
Will delete biomaterials based on selector. Only one selector will be used.
@HELP@
